import React from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Dropdown, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Layout: React.FC<{ children: React.ReactNode }> = ({ children }) => { const { user, logout, isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = async () => { try { await logout(); navigate('/login'); } catch (error) { console.error('Logout failed:', error); } }; const isActive = (path: string) => location.pathname === path; if (!isAuthenticated) { return <>{children}; } return (
{/* Header */}
Philippine Procurement Solutions
Dashboard {/* Procurement-specific navigation */} {user?.role === 'procurement' && ( <> Purchase Orders Suppliers Inventory Blockchain )} {/* Admin access to all features */} {user?.is_admin && ( <> Purchase Orders Suppliers Inventory Blockchain )} {/* Validator role - blockchain consensus operations */} {user?.role === 'validator' && ( Blockchain Consensus )} {/* Auditor role - read-only access to reports and blockchain */} {user?.role === 'auditor' && ( <> Blockchain Explorer )} {/* Finance role - financial operations and reports */} {user?.role === 'finance' && ( <> Purchase Orders Financial Records )} {user?.is_admin && ( Users )} {/* Reports dropdown - accessible to all authenticated users */} Reports Audit Trail BIR Reports Inventory Reports Order Reports {user?.is_admin && ( <> System Reports )}
{user?.full_name || 'User'} {user?.is_admin && ( Admin )} Profile {user?.is_admin && ( Settings )} Logout
{/* Main Content */}
{children}
{/* Footer */}

); }; export default Layout;
